transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Ha?
Customer: Ha sir, kal call aaya tha aapko?
Executive: Isi number mein call aaya tha isliye phone kiya.
Customer: Aap Sudhir ji baat kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: Ha bolna.
Executive: Kal aapne call kiya tha na mujhe IndiaMART ke regarding?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Hmm. Ha toh usi ke liye call kiya maine aapko.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Abhi aap laptop vagaira pe ho?
Customer: Ha. Acha isi number mein aapko office se phone kar leta hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Matlab?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Matlab ek minute rukiye, ek minute rukiye ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: Theek hai chalo ek second.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Hello. Ha good afternoon mam.
Customer: Ha mam.
Executive: Bol rahe hai. Mam main digital bol raha hu IndiaMART active tax solution se.
Customer: Ji ji ji bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Executive: IndiaMART se abhi puch rahe the IndiaMART se by leads hua na. By leads mujhe ha mujhe by leads kya hai toh abhi leads consume kiya jaye aur allocate karna karna hai. By leads abhi allocate karna hai. Okay?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ha. Abhi nahi puch raha hai. Ek toh ek toh video mein ek link share kar rahi hu. Aapke pass laptop hai?
Customer: Ha laptop hai.
Executive: Ha toh ek baar waha se ek baar video meet pe join kijiye.
Customer: Ha okay. Yaha par activetaxsolutionsmarketing@gmail.com par gaya hoga ek mail.
Executive: Ek second ek second ek second ek second.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Ha boliye. Kya boliye?
Executive: Aapko waha pe ek mail aaya hoga video meet ke liye join karne ke liye.
Customer: Video WhatsApp se?
Executive: Nahi nahi mail pe.
Customer: Mail par. Okay. Active tax solutions.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Invitation from an unknown sender video meet with ha ha. Video meet IndiaMART team this one 1 pm to 2 pm.
Customer: Yes yes join with Google Meet. Okay okay okay.
(silence)
Executive: Yes mam join now.
Executive: Clear join?
Executive: Hello. Ha apni screen share kar rahi hu. Ha main apni screen share kar rahi hu.
Executive: Screen share?
Executive: Hmm main apni kar rahi hu dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Yes yes yes yes got it.
Executive: Okay.
(silence)
Executive: Ek second rakhna aapka catalog open kar rahi hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
(silence)
Executive: Ye products hai aapke.
Executive: Okay.
(silence)
Executive: By leads pe jaiye. Leads pe jaiye.
Executive: Jab aap enter mein kar rahe hai. Abhi aapne ek toh by leads mein aap kaam karte hai. Ek aapke direct inquiry.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Toh woh aapko direct.
Executive: Aapko West Bengal mein karna hai.
(silence)
Executive: Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi.
Executive: Ye Andhra Pradesh mein kar rahe ho?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Company law karke aa raha hai.
Executive: Pan card.
Executive: Toh do minute pe isme aap kyun nahi kar rahe ho?
Executive: Ha sabhi number se bol jata hai.
Executive: Ye lead aapko dikh rahi hai aapke portal pe?
Customer: Ha portal pe abhi dekh rahe hai.
Executive: Company law pan card services contact buyer now. Abhi mujhe allocate karna hai mam.
Executive: Matlab?
Executive: Ek minute mein call cut karti hu meeting mein baat karte hai theek hai. Okay okay okay okay.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about by leads.

- Wants to know how to consume leads.

- Wants to allocate by leads.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meet link.

- Executive explained about by leads.

- Executive showed the customer's catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss further in the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, allocation, video meet, catalog
